title: Content Removed
body:
Hi Riot.

Is there any way we can get more clarity on what content was removed when we get the automated message from you guys?

It was the first time some of ny content has been removed due to the "don't be a jerk" rule. However i have no idea what was removed. If i knew what was removed i would be able to avoid it in the future.

Looking forward to a helpful responce.
